products.title: Sunlit Garden
products.author: Lorenzo Moretti
products.description: A warm and vibrant impressionist painting capturing the golden sunlight over a peaceful Italian garden.

products.title: Silent Waves
products.author: Akira Tanaka
products.description: A minimal yet powerful expression of calm waves using cool tones and abstract strokes.

products.title: Autumn Streets
products.author: Elena Petrova
products.description: A realistic street-view painting portraying autumn colors and quiet evening lights.

products.title: The Red Horizon
products.author: Mateo Delgado
products.description: A bold abstract piece exploring emotional contrasts through red and dark geometric shapes.

products.title: Blue Echo
products.author: Am√©lie Dupont
products.description: Soft contemporary gradients and layered brush textures create a soothing blue composition.

products.title: Forest Spirits
products.author: Sven Johansson
products.description: A mystical depiction of Scandinavian forests blending realism with fantasy elements.

products.title: Golden Mirage
products.author: Yusuf Al-Rahman
products.description: A surreal vision of a golden desert mirage merging dreamlike shapes with shifting sands.

products.title: Urban Rhythm
products.author: Sofia Novak
products.description: Energetic strokes and bright contrasts bring the rhythm of city life onto the canvas.

products.title: Mountain Breath
products.author: Dimitri Kalov
products.description: A peaceful representation of mountain ranges at dawn with soft pastel colors.

products.title: Whispers of Night
products.author: Isabella Romano
products.description: A dreamy night-sky fantasy painting filled with glowing stars and mystical silhouettes.
